## Task 11

### Data Wrangling 

```{r tidy_tsk11}
letter1700 <- let %>% 
  str_split("") %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  .[c(1, seq(0, str_count(let), 1700))] %>% 
  str_flatten() %>% 
  str_remove_all('\\..*$')

letter1700

numlet <- letnum %>% 
  str_extract_all('[:digit:]+') %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  as.integer() %>% 
  letters[.] %>% 
  paste(collapse = '')
  
numlet

spacelet <- let %>% 
  str_remove_all('\\.') %>% 
  str_remove_all('[:space:]') %>% 
  str_locate('[aeiou]')
  
spacelet
```

## Task 23

### R Functions

```{r functions}
pullout <- function(df, n){
  df %>% 
  str_split("") %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  .[c(1, seq(0, str_count(df), n))] %>% 
  str_flatten() %>% 
  str_remove_all('\\..*$')
}

numberconvert <- function(df){
  df %>% 
  str_extract_all('[:digit:]+') %>% 
  unlist() %>% 
  as.integer() %>% 
  letters[.] %>% 
  paste(collapse = '')
}

spacevowels <- function(df){
  df %>% 
  str_remove_all('\\.') %>% 
  str_remove_all('[:space:]') %>% 
  str_locate('[aeiou]')

}
```

### Data Wrangling & Visualization 

```{r tidy_tsk23}
pullout(let, 1700)
numberconvert(letnum)
spacevowels(let)
```
